code: @Override @Before public void setUp() throws Exception {     deleteDirectory("target/stream").     createDirectory("target/stream").     file = new File("target/stream/scanstreamfile.txt").     file.createNewFile().     super.setUp(). }
@Test public void testScanFile() throws Exception {     Thread.sleep(60000). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             from("stream:file?fileName=target/stream/scanstreamfile.txt&scanStream=true&scanStreamDelay=200&retry=true").to("log:line").         }     }. }
